story/image-1.png: A long, long time ago, there lived a hare in the forest who always boasted of his running speed
story/image-2.png: He would often tease the tortoise for being the slowest animal around
story/image-3.png: One fine day, he dared the tortoise to a race in order to exhibit his skills in front of other animals in the forest
story/image-4.png: Fed up with the hare’s bragging, the tortoise finally accepted the challenge and decided to compete him in a race
story/image-5.png: On the day of the race, all the animals of the forest gathered to watch the competition between the hare and the tortoise.  Just as they were about to begin the race, the hare mocked the tortoise for accepting the challenge
story/image-6.png: Further, he also mentioned that soon after he wins the race, the tortoise would be ridiculed by other animals for accepting the dare
story/image-7.png: The tortoise kept silent and didn’t pay heed to the hare’s words
